avdta.network.link.transit

Class TransitLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.link.transit.TransitLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BusLink, WalkingLink

    public abstract class TransitLink
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A transit link is a virtual link that represents the flow of travelers on non-personal vehicle modes. Transit links cannot be traversed by vehicles. Extensions include WalkingLink, and BusLink (which is a direct connection between two nodes that may not be connected in the real network).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
